scripts.install:all: yarn && cd frontend && yarn && cd ../backend && yarn
scripts.dev: yarn run set_env:dev && concurrently "cd backend && yarn start" "cd frontend && yarn start"
scripts.prod: yarn run set_env:prod && concurrently "cd backend && yarn start" "cd frontend && yarn start"
scripts.set_env:dev: firebase use sharing-excess-7e887 && cp firebase.dev.json firebase.json && cp environments/.env.frontend.dev frontend/.env && cp environments/.env.backend.dev backend/.env
scripts.set_env:prod: firebase use sharing-excess-prod && cp firebase.prod.json firebase.json && cp environments/.env.frontend.prod frontend/.env && cp environments/.env.backend.prod backend/.env
scripts.wiki:pull: git subtree pull --prefix docs wiki master --squash --message='Merge wiki updates into docs.'
scripts.wiki:push: git add docs && git commit -m 'updating wiki' && git subtree push --prefix docs wiki master
